noun.description: A thing or event that existed before or logically precedes another.
examples: some antecedents to the African novel might exist in Africa's oral traditions

adjective.description: Preceding in time or order; previous or preexisting.
examples: the antecedent events that prompt you to break a diet

origin: Late Middle English: from Old French or from Latin antecedent- going before, from antecedere, from ante before + cedere go.
